fields.description:
Upgrade of networking config is necessary when coming from managed mode in 4.1.2 -> 4.2.0 to use the new model. 

Seeing tools issue after upgrade and setting {{cloud.network.network_configuration}} to desired json. This property is not present when describing properties. Setting the property does not give a response and the property is not seen when describing properties, nor is its value displayed when trying to get it. In each case (set, update, describe) using --debug flag I can see the value.

There should be {{cloud.network.network_configuration}}
{code}
[root@h-08 ~]# euctl cloud.network --region localhost
cloud.network.ec2_classic_additional_protocols_allowed =
cloud.network.global_max_network_index = 4096
cloud.network.global_max_network_tag = 4096
cloud.network.global_min_network_index = 2
cloud.network.global_min_network_tag = 1
cloud.network.min_broadcast_interval = 5
cloud.network.network_index_pending_timeout = 35
cloud.network.network_tag_pending_timeout = 35
{code} 


Setting/updating the property gives no output either
{code}
[root@h-08 ~]# euctl cloud.network.network_configuration=@network.json --region localhost --debug
2015-10-12 15:44:19,862 DEBUG   Euctl parsed arguments: {'reset': False, 'show_defaults': False, 'security_token': None, 'dump': False, 'all_types': False, 'format': 'json', 'suppress_name': False, 'region': 'localhost', 'edit': False, 'prop_pairs': [('cloud.network.network_configuration', '{\n"Clusters": [\n  {\n    "MacPrefix": "d0:0d",\n    "Name": "one"\n  }\n],\n"InstanceDnsServers": [\n  "10.111.5.83"\n],\n"ManagedSubnet": {\n  "MaxVlan": "639",\n  "MinVlan": "512",\n  "Netmask": "255.255.0.0",\n  "Subnet": "172.16.0.0"\n},\n"Mode": "MANAGED-NOVLAN",\n"PublicIps": [\n  "10.111.31.13",\n  "10.111.31.14", \n  "10.111.31.15",\n  "10.111.31.16",\n  "10.111.31.45",\n  "10.111.31.46",\n  "10.111.31.47",\n  "10.111.31.48",\n  "10.111.31.49",\n  "10.111.31.50",\n  "10.111.31.51",\n  "10.111.31.52",\n  "10.111.31.53",\n  "10.111.31.54",\n  "10.111.30.216",\n  "10.111.30.217"\n]\n}')], 'url': None, 'show_descriptions': False, 'key_id': None, 'suppress_all': False, 'secret_key': None}
